mapper.select: select ID, HITCOUNT1, PRICETYPE, HITCOUNT56, HITCOUNT14, QUANTITYSOLD56, RUNTIME, HITCOUNT7, PRICE, QUANTITYSOLD14, QUANTITYSOLD3, HITCOUNT3, QUANTITYSOLD28, UPDATETIME, HITCOUNT28, HITCOUNT21, HITCOUNTTOTAL, QUANTITYSOLD1, QUANTITYSOLD21, ITEMID, QUANTITYSOLD7, QUANTITYSOLDTOTAL from db_shoppingitemlist where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, HITCOUNT1, PRICETYPE, HITCOUNT56, HITCOUNT14, QUANTITYSOLD56, RUNTIME, HITCOUNT7, PRICE, QUANTITYSOLD14, QUANTITYSOLD3, HITCOUNT3, QUANTITYSOLD28, UPDATETIME, HITCOUNT28, HITCOUNT21, HITCOUNTTOTAL, QUANTITYSOLD1, QUANTITYSOLD21, ITEMID, QUANTITYSOLD7, QUANTITYSOLDTOTAL from db_shoppingitemlist

and 1=1
